That serial doesnt work!! I fixed it so you wont get the trial version thing poping up or the upgrade thing if your still using the trial. Go to My computer, Hard drive, Program files, then Sound Spectrum, then whitecap. Then go to resources and delete License.dat and Resources.sstome!! Make sure you restart media player and the visualizer in order to take effect. You will get a little error reading at the top every once in a while but its better than the trila thing poping up all the time!
A serial that go rid of that trial version notifier would be good.

I KNOW THE WAY TO DELETE THE TRAIL THING! 

uninstall.
disable your internet connection.
install.
go to settings-->check for updates-->never.
shut down computer.
restart and put your internet on again.

it should work now,it did for me.
Do what SumAussieCobber, Works fine thanks man for the help!
